name: Back to Blue
description: A simple theme to make Tumblr's new stark blue revert back to the softer blue.
additional_info:
Released: 1/30/2019 - This should work on every page where the new changes have occurred. If not, please let me know where you found the offending new blue! I use Mozilla Firefox, so I'm not sure how this works in other browsers.

If you have any questions or tips, feel free to send them to my blog: tinabelchersrpt.tumblr.com
